content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: ARMNRS
      operator: non_empty
    - name: RFENDTC
      operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000192
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when ARMNRS is not blank and RFENDTC is provided.
Outcome:
  Message: RFENDTC is not blank when ARMNRS is provided.
  Output Variables:
    - ARMNRS
    - RFENDTC
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0530
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Required for all randomized subjects; null for screen
                  failures or unassigned subjects.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: '5.2'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - DM

json.Description: Raise an error when ARMNRS is not blank and RFENDTC is provided.

Outcome.Message: RFENDTC is not blank when ARMNRS is provided.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Required for all randomized subjects; null for screen failures or unassigned subjects.
